headline: Fight Club
abstract: “Race of Aces,” John Bruning’s action-fueled World War II narrative, follows the elite fighter pilots who competed to shoot down the most enemy planes.
lead_paragraph: RACE OF ACESWWII’s Elite Airmen and the Epic Battle to Become the Master of the SkyBy John R. Bruning
keywords: Race of Aces: WWII's Elite Airmen and the Epic Battle to Become the Masters of the Sky (Book)
